explanation: [0-0] The scene takes place in a gully with a river flowing through it. Some green vegetation can be seen on the top of the slope in the distance. On the right side is an orange kayak, and on the left is a man with a reddish-orange safety helmet, wearing suspenders and exposing his arms, sitting in a red kayak. In front of them is another person wearing a black safety helmet, sitting in a blue kayak.

[0-3] As they paddle down the slope into the river, the red kayak and the blue kayak collide slightly. Subsequently, the orange kayak cuts in between them, pushing the red kayak out of the frame on the left side and the blue kayak to the right.
